org.apache.cassandra.db

Interface CounterCell

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cell, OnDiskAtom
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferCounterCell, NativeCounterCell

    public interface CounterCell
extends Cell
    A column that represents a partitioned counter.
